MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_LIMIT_ACTIVE_PROJECT_.label: Number limit of project each year

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_EQUITY_LIMIT_PAYMENT.label: Limit Equity Payment
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_EQUITY_LIMIT_PAYMENT.source_SQL: ( SELECT ID, name FROM ecommerce_mpay WHERE ecommerce = '1' AND IF(ecommerce_mpay.ecommerce_status > 0 , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_test_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_test_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) ) ORDER BY ecommerce_mpay.name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_PLEDGE_LIMIT_PAYMENT.label: Limit Pledge Payment
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_PLEDGE_LIMIT_PAYMENT.source_SQL: ( SELECT ID, name FROM ecommerce_mpay WHERE ecommerce = '1' AND IF(ecommerce_mpay.ecommerce_status > 0 , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_test_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_test_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) ) ORDER BY ecommerce_mpay.name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_DONATION_LIMIT_PAYMEN.label: Limit Donation Payment
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_DONATION_LIMIT_PAYMEN.source_SQL: ( SELECT ID, name FROM ecommerce_mpay WHERE ecommerce = '1' AND IF(ecommerce_mpay.ecommerce_status > 0 , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) , (CONCAT(ecommerce_mpay.service_test_domain, ecommerce_mpay.service_test_path) != '' || ecommerce_mpay.disable_service > 0) ) ORDER BY ecommerce_mpay.name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_DONATION.label: Form donation
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_DONATION.source_SQL: ( SELECT layout.ID AS ID , layout.name AS name FROM layout WHERE layout.ID_type = (SELECT layout_type.ID FROM layout_type WHERE layout_type.name = 'Module') AND layout.value = 'form' ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_REWARD.label: Form reward
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_REWARD.source_SQL: ( SELECT layout.ID AS ID , layout.name AS name FROM layout WHERE layout.ID_type = (SELECT layout_type.ID FROM layout_type WHERE layout_type.name = 'Module') AND layout.value = 'form' ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FOLLOW.label: Form follow
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FOLLOW.source_SQL: ( SELECT layout.ID AS ID , layout.name AS name FROM layout WHERE layout.ID_type = (SELECT layout_type.ID FROM layout_type WHERE layout_type.name = 'Module') AND layout.value = 'form' ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_REQUEST_INFO.label: Form request info
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_REQUEST_INFO.source_SQL: ( SELECT layout.ID AS ID , layout.name AS name FROM layout WHERE layout.ID_type = (SELECT layout_type.ID FROM layout_type WHERE layout_type.name = 'Module') AND layout.value = 'form' ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_INVEST.label: Form invest
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_INVEST.source_SQL: ( SELECT layout.ID AS ID , layout.name AS name FROM layout WHERE layout.ID_type = (SELECT layout_type.ID FROM layout_type WHERE layout_type.name = 'Module') AND layout.value = 'form' ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_PROJECT.label: Form Field Project
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_PROJECT.source_SQL: ( SELECT DISTINCT module_form_fields.name AS ID , module_form_fields.name AS name FROM module_form_fields WHERE 1 ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_PRICE.label: Form Field Price
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_PRICE.source_SQL: ( SELECT DISTINCT module_form_fields.name AS ID , module_form_fields.name AS name FROM module_form_fields WHERE 1 ORDER BY name )

MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_MESSAGE.label: Form Field Message
MOD_CROWDFUND_IDEA_FORM_FIELD_MESSAGE.source_SQL: ( SELECT DISTINCT module_form_fields.name AS ID , module_form_fields.name AS name FROM module_form_fields WHERE 1 ORDER BY name )
